Item ID1123

The Adamant platebody is an armour used in melee with stat bonuses between mithril and rune. A player with 88 Smithing can create an adamant platebody by using five adamantite bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 312.5 Smithing experience per platebody. It requires level 30 Defence to wear.

Smithing an adamant platebody is one of the requirements for completing the elite Lumbridge & Draynor Diary.

+65+63+55-6+63

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

2 October 2014
(update | poll)

The alchemy value of the adamant platebody has been increased from 7680 coins to 9984 coins to create a viable alternative to superheating for smithing training.

7 March 2005
(update)

The item was graphically updated.
